de.ralleytn.simple.audio

Class AbstractAudio

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.audio.AbstractAudio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Audio, Playable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferedAudio, StreamedAudio

    public abstract class AbstractAudio
extends java.lang.Object
implements Audio
    Implements the Audio and should be extended by all classes representing a form of playable audio.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

      • setVolume

        public void setVolume(float volume)
        Description copied from interface: Playable
        Sets the volume. The given value is in decibel and is more like an amplifier to the volume and not the volume itself.
        Specified by:
        setVolume in interface Playable
        Parameters:
        volume - the new volume
